subject: ORDER #SSN3196
description_text:
ORDER #SSN3196Hello I recently purchased pedals and motors but the tracking
shows nothing. I purchased premium delivery. Your website also says “taxes
included” can you please confirm this

conversations.body_text: Hi Jake Dyer,    Yes, your order has been split into two packages. The pedals have arrived in the UK and are expected to be delivered to you within the next couple of days.  https://www.sf-international.com/gb/en/support/querySupport/waybill?No=SF3292095650187  The other package is expected to arrive around the 11th.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047023889671
